text: kama 'arsalna almursalin qablik 'arsalnak -ayha alrswl- fi 'umat qad madat min qabliha 'umam almrslyn; litatlu ealaa hadhih al'umat alquran almanzil elyk, wahal qawmak aljhwd bwhdanyt alrhmn, qul lahum -ayha alrswl-: alrhmn aldhy lm ttkhdhwh 'ilhana wahdana hu rabiy wahdah la mebwd bihaqi swah, ealayh aietamadat wwthqt, wa'iilayh mrjey w'inabty
